body:
Modifications : 
- [x] if `-v` or similar flags are present in **any** position, mode is `vcheck` 
- [x] the wrapper will not add search paths, rpaths etc. in `vcheck` mode

Refers to [this thread](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/spack/hvo1h9yyhrw) in the google group

Note : please check carefully this PR, as it changes `cc` and was not tested with other compilers than Intel.
title: Fix : OpenMPI with Intel compiler (and similar issues)
